title: metacyber
author: metacyber
content: What is $CYBER Token ?ABSTRACTMore than half a century ago, he appeared - the Internet and has become an inseparable part of modern civilization. Having become widespread and growing day by day, the Internet has become a way for people to express themselves.For a long time, mankind has strived to create some better parallel world with great opportunities, this is how the Metaverse appeared.The Metaverse, which every fifth Internet user is familiar with, is a hypothetical repetition of the Internet.This report will provide general information about the "$CYBER Token" and "$CYBER Token Project".PROJECT $CYBER TOKENThe $CYBER project developed in Metaverse World is formed and created as a game project. Created by $CYBER Game on the basis of the Metaverse, it includes a playing field with a total area of 4096 square meters, divided into sections in the universe. The field was created to make it easier to write software in binary.Each $CYBER Game player starts the game with a default avatar from the "Character Design" and "Upgrade Box" fields. The user, thanks to the high-quality functionality of the game, will be able to easily form and improve his character with the help of items that he finds / receives during the game or buys, or with the help of NFTS.Avatars in the $CYBER Game, assisted by artificial intelligence and machine learning, analyze and study users' gaming routine throughout the week. Thus, avatars can independently perform acquired chores when players are not in the game.THE ARENA FIELDThe arena field, which consists of a $CYBER Game field with an area of ​​512 square meters, is a field where players team up to compete for the $CYBER token and immediately receive a certain amount of $CYBER tokens when they win.According to the rules of the game, teams in the Arena must consist of 2 or 4 characters.A player who wants to fight in the Arena will have to deposit any amount of $CYBER tokens individually into the team chest, then they can join the Arena.Teams meet in the Arena in random order and must have the same number of $CYBER tokens in the chest.THE CHAMPIONS ARENAThe Champion Arena, which consists of a field of 256 square meters, is a field that only the top 10 warriors in the ranking system can enter, where they are ranked after battles in the game.Warriors who, according to the rules of the game, can join this Arena, must also deposit any amount of $CYBER tokens in order to enter the Arena.After each duel, only one victorious warrior remains. This player advances by owning all the $CYBER tokens contributed by the opposing warrior. In this system, at the end of the duel, the winning warrior will be rewarded with both the $CYBER token from the opponents and all the $CYBER tokens he has collected.THE DUEL FIELDThe 256 square meter duel field is a field where players compete individually for the $CYBER token and they immediately receive $CYBER tokens if they win.Each player, according to the rules of the game, must deposit any amount of $CYBER tokens in his own duel chest.After the confrontation, the victorious warrior receives $CYBER tokens from his opponent's chest.At the end of each battle, the $CYBER tokens in the defeated player's chest are sent to the $CYBER Token House for use in game development and duels.AVATAR DESIGN & UPGRADE FIELDAvatar design and upgrade field, consists of a field of 256 square meters in $CYBER Game.Each player starts the game with a free default character.The following characters can be purchased and upgraded in the game:WitchElfCyclopsMetaGoblinDemonBartonAngelHarleyP.S. The features and design of the avatar will be announced later. Our art team is currently working on it.MARKETPLACEMarketplace, located in the "Avatar Design and Upgrade" section, allows players to create unique characters.The user will be able to buy any game inventory, having previously studied its color, shape, texture, functions, appearance on the avatar itself, as well as the ability to add it to your avatar through 3D catalogs.THE INNThis field consists of 128 square meters in the $CYBER Game. Here, users will be able to spend their free time from the game and find new friends in the team, as well as attend various events that will be presented in the game.THE TRAINING FIELDThe area of this field is 512 square meters, where players train to improve their characters and their functions in the $CYBER Game.Players who wish to enter the training field will be required to pay a game-set amount of $CYBER tokens per character.$CYBER TOKEN HOME$CYBER Token Home in $CYBER Game is the center of the game, consisting of 1024 square meters of the playing field. This house will host:Live concerts, master classes and conferencesMeeting about the $CYBER token and the game -Character ad days -NFT auctionsEach user will have the opportunity to join all the events in the game with his avatar that will be held in this house.Players who join concerts or conferences with their avatars will have the opportunity to watch what is happening in the front row, listen and even interview their favorite artists.Quotas and prices will be announced on billboards as the event progresses.$CYBER TECH COMPANYThe $CYBER token, which opens the gates of the Metaverse to its investors through the game we are creating, aims to connect the real world in the Metaverse with a technology company. Using wearable technology with the development of the ecosystem created in the game, $CYBER Token investors and players can transfer their emotions in the real world to the virtual world with their own unique avatars. They can experience everything that happens in the game and in real life through wearable technology.Example : When using wearable technology that is produced with integrated systems, you will be able to sense changes in the weather in the game using receptors on your skin in real life in the Metaverse. This is just an example to make it easier for you to understand.
